resources.string: Allows the application to receive updates about your current context, which includes your (symbolic) location and activity.
Allows the application to retrieve a list of places you have been, and to convert symbolic locations into physical co-ordinates
Allows the application to modify the list of places that the context analyser knows about.
Allows the application to retrieve a list of journeys you have made, including the activities that make up the journeys and symbolic locations they run between.
Allows the application to modify the list of journeys that the context analyser knows about.
Permissions related to the context analyser service and its API.
Allows the application to make context-related broadcasts.
